# ARIA ONE Webapp - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is the ARIA ONE Vocal Artist Identity System web application. It's a modern, single-page application built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focused on providing a sleek interface for vocal artists.

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+)
- **Styling**: Custom CSS with CSS variables
- **Font**: Montserrat (Google Fonts)
- **Color Scheme**: Dark theme with neon yellow accent (#f7ff3a)

## Coding Standards

### General Guidelines
- Keep the codebase simple and maintainable
- Prioritize vanilla JavaScript over frameworks
- Maintain the existing dark theme aesthetic with neon yellow accents
- Ensure responsive design across all screen sizes
- Follow mobile-first design principles

### Code Style
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript features
- Use consistent indentation (2 spaces)
- Use clear, descriptive variable and function names
- Add comments for complex logic or important sections
- Keep functions small and focused on a single responsibility

### Performance
- Optimize images and assets for web
- Minimize DOM manipulations
- Use event delegation where appropriate
- Lazy load resources when possible

## Task Preferences

### When Adding Features
- Maintain the existing visual design language
- Ensure new features are accessible (ARIA attributes, semantic HTML)
- Test across different screen sizes
- Keep JavaScript vanilla (no framework dependencies)

### When Fixing Bugs
- Test the fix across different browsers if applicable
- Ensure the fix doesn't break existing functionality
- Update comments if logic changes

### When Refactoring
- Maintain backward compatibility
- Keep changes minimal and focused
- Preserve existing functionality
- Update relevant documentation

## File Organization
- `index.html` - Main HTML structure
- `Style.css` - All styling rules
- `Script.js` - All JavaScript logic
- `README.md` - Project documentation

## Design System
- Primary Background: `#050507`
- Secondary Background: `#0b0d12`
- Accent Color: `#f7ff3a` (neon yellow)
- Primary Text: `#ffffff`
- Secondary Text: `#c6cad6`
- Border Color: `#2a2f3c`

## Important Notes
- This is a static website with no backend dependencies
- The site focuses on visual presentation and user experience
- Maintain the futuristic, professional aesthetic
- All changes should work without a build process
